price: 25. No Laghw (dirty, false, evil vain talk) will they hear therein, nor any sinful speech (like backbiting).
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā tathīman
